content:
AUD87H The user needs help resetting their password. 

OSK54T The user is experiencing problems with their hardware, such as a computer not turning on or a printer not working. 

PLA93U The user is having trouble with software, such as a program not opening 

FAO35N The user is having trouble connecting to the internet or a network drive. 

GST72U The user has lost data and needs assistance recovering it.

I have provided intent IDs and descriptions that relate to intents a customer might have when contacting an IT department. Please classify the following utterance into one of these categories and provide the output in a json. 

"Hi I need to esign a document in Adobe but every time I open it it gives and error and says I don't have the correct permissions. Please help."
